info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 20 at 12:41AM MDT until October 21 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo CO
info.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected.
* WHERE...Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet.
* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 8 AM MDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction:
Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

parameter.value: HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM MDT TUESDAY

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
